meta.name: description
meta.content: Victoria Independent School District serves Pre-K-12th grade students and is located in Victoria, TX.

img.alt: Hotspot Distribution Update & Expanded Wi-Fi Thumbnail Image
Snapcodes for 2020-2021 Student Registration Thumbnail Image

div.div: During the week of April 27, snapcodes will be emailed to parents for 2020-2021 student registration.

img.alt: VISD Board of Trustees Work Session Notice & Agenda Thumbnail Image

h1.a: VISD Board of Trustees Work Session Notice & Agenda

div.div: The VISD Board of Trustees will hold a virtual work session on Wednesday, April 29, 2020 at 4:00 pm.

img.alt: Technology Distribution Update Thumbnail Image

div.div: Technology distribution scheduled for April 23 and 24 has been moved to April 30 and May 1.

img.alt: Face-to-Face Instruction Suspended for Remainder of School Year Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Face-to-Face Instruction Suspended for Remainder of School Year

div.div: Victoria ISD will suspend face-to-face instruction for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, per Governor Abbott's executive order.

img.alt: Technology Distribution Update Thumbnail Image

div.div: Technology pickup dates have been changed due to shipping delays.

div.p: The Victoria Independent School District does not discriminate against any person on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, religion, sex, sexual orientation, disability, age or any other basis prohibited by law for admission, treatment, or participation in its educational programs, services and activities, or employment.
